title: Tampa Is Looking Like the New Titletown
itunes:title: Tampa Is Looking Like the New Titletown
description:
The world will (virtually) descend on Tampa in a couple Sundays and Tom Brady could add some more hardware if the home team can claim a win. With reigning champs in the NHL and a World Series runner-up (not to mention a recent NBA champion from Toronto camping out), the Florida city is taking the sports world by storm. Jason, Michael and Mike discuss the economic ups and downs of winning and hosting in a pandemic, an empty Hall of Fame ballot and some more barrier-breaking in both pro basketball and football.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
